replies.bodyText: @vpapavas I'm not overriding the default, if the config isn't present and you create a new KsqlRequestConfig, it should automatically set to what the default value is. I wrote a new test file to illustrate the behavior. https://github.com/confluentinc/ksql/blob/b66866b7a3f76547b217579935bc00240854d530/ksqldb-common/src/test/java/io/confluent/ksql/util/KsqlRestConfigTest.java
replies.author: stevenpyzhang
